reviewText:
this is just what TV movies are all about.
It was definitely worth seeing and the acting was good.
I mainly watched this because Raven was in it and she did really good in her role.
Especially when she played "disguise" again, like she did in her tv show "That's So Raven".
As for the girl in the movie who lost the man of her dreams, they could've at least casted a CUTER girl LOL
But overall, i love the movie.
It was really nice.

I won't bore you with another re-cap of the movie, every other review has done a fine job at that.  I do have to admit I was a little skeptical in watching this because it has Raven Symone in it and I automatically think of the over acted, annoying and ridiculous show "all about Raven".  But I don't know who I liked better, her or Joanna Garcia, they are both totally adorable in this movie.  Raven is hilarious and definentley shines as the sarcastic and sometimes tempermental best friend while Joanna's character is level-headed and supportive.  Both girls are lovable!!  You must watch this!

I thought the movie was GREAT! I love Raven Symone' and Joanna Garcia! And, the fact that it was my granddaughers first movie made it very special! Her name is Kaysia Monique Stove she played the role of Young Abigail!!

The movie is predictable. The humor is snarky. There are some plot weaknesses. The characters are unrealistic. But it spite of whatever criticism I could come up with, the fact is that it worked well to give us a very enjoyable film. Raven-Symoné and Joanna Garcia-Swisher absolutely shine in this LOL comedy about 3 girls determined to ruin the wedding of their childhood girlfriend Caitlyn McNabb played by Virginia Williams. Caitlyn is getting married to Tony, the former boyfriend of Rachel (Chryssie Whitehead). She claims she is pregnant by him and in this small Louisiana town, that is what they are expected to do. Rachel is still in love with him, and the girls suspect something isn't right.

Some minor sexual references.
I did enjoy watching this movie it was very funny. And I am glad I bought it so I can watch it again and again.

Oh my God. I thought this was going to be a stupid movie, I saw Raven Symone and said 'this is another of her stupid movies where she tries so hard to be funny.' But wow, it was really good; good story line, actually funny, and it wasn't just about her, it revolved around the three bridesmaids. I watched it with my sisters, and they liked it also. I could watch it again and be entertained. Seriously though, it was a good movie.

I absolutely loved this movie. It is anything but the typical wedding movie. In this film the blushing bride doesn't get her happy fairytale ending while her lifelong friends watch her in bliss; so happy. No. Instead the story takes a more interesting turn where karma kicks in like its supposed to. This movie is absolutely hysterical and very entertaining to watch. It also has some sweet romances woven into the storyline that are quite enjoyable to watch blossom. This is a wonderfully funny and sweet movie that I have found myself watching over and over again. If you are a fan of romantic comedies but you are sick of the same old storylines, watch this movie. BubblesReviews.com  Rating: 5 out of 5

"Revenge of the Breidesmaids" is one of the best movies I've seen in a long time! It gives standard romantic comedies a run for their money with a number of plot twists and plenty of wit!

"Revenge of the Bridesmaids" has underlying messages of friendship, love, and, as the title suggests, revenge. You will laugh, smile, and laugh some more while watching this movie!

The comedic timing of both Raven-Symon (Abigail Scanlon) and JoAnna Garcia (Parker Wald) really make this movie what it is!
Their talent is undeniable!

Out of all the ABC Family movies I've seen, this one is 10 steps ahead of the others.

A guaranteed favorite for all comedy fans! :)

Four young girls grew up together, and even then they were divided into the "haves" and "have nots." One girl lived in a home so large that they joked it had its own zip code. But girls grow up, and their lives went in different directions.

Abigail (Raven-Symoné) and Parker (Joanna Garcia) live in New York City. They are "marginally successful" with their careers in writing and acting, respectively. Rachel (Chryssie Whitehead) lives in her original small town, but at least has a great, loving boyfriend. Caitlyn (Virginia Williams), daughter of mansion owner Olivia (Beth Broderick), left for college and sorority life.

And during a family reunion, Abigail and Parker learn that Caitlyn is going to marry Rachel's boyfriend, to Rachel's dismay. Somehow, Olivia is in control of all this... a nefarious plot?

Time for Abigail and Parker to support Rachel and break up this wedding. But how? First, they need to get themselves invited to be bridesmaids. Then... revenge! In the first 30 seconds of the movie, you'll get a very good idea of how this is going. The bridesmaids have been arrested!

I was worried that this made-for-TV movie, Revenge of the Bridesmaids, was going to be corny, goofy, stereotypic, and shallow. Thankfully, it was much better than expected. The down-to-earth nature of Abigail and Parker, the exquisite preparations for the wedding, the imperfections of all the characters, and the overall intrigue made this movie work.

Cute, family-friendly, first date movie.

Raven and Joanna Garcia are lifelong friends.  When they (Abigail and Parker) return from New York City to visit their home town, they discover that their best friend Rachel is a bridesmaid in the wedding of their childhood friend, Caitlyn (aka spoiled little rich girl, and Tony, who was Rachel's boyfriend until Caitlyn interfered. Abigail and Parker decide to run some interference of their own. They manipulate Caitlyn and become bridesmaids as well so that they and Rachel can sabotage the wedding from the inside. That's when the hilarity begins!  With help from a police detective who happens to be a groomsman, the girls strive to ruin Caitlyn's wedding while dodging her controlling mother and hopefully reuniting Tony and Rachel. As an added bonus, one of the girls adds some romance to her own life. You can kinda predict the ending, but there is so much action, and so many laughs getting there it's very enjoyable.  We have been waiting to hear that it's available on dvd.
Love this movie. It's funny and full of quip and good humor. Highly recommend it.
I originally saw this movie on Netflix, and was glad to have my own copy. A romantic comedy, perfect for a girls night in!
I remember seeing this and liked it better than the bridesmaids. I needed to own this !
It's really funny good pick me up
Cute movie and price was great.  My daughter really likes this movie

I've seen this movie so long ago that I just had to get it.  When I saw this again, it is still a very funny movie.  If you want a good laugh get this movie.  I think this movie would be alright for young family members to see as well.  A great movie!

It wasn't painful to watch. The story has good potential, but ends up being a little bit corny. Younger audiences, like teens, might enjoy it more than adults, but at least it's wholesome enough with no violence or bad language.
I love this movie and Raven was awesome in this film. Sense of humor and comedy is great. Love it!!! Worth having this movie in my collection!!!
Awesome movie delivery was quick
everything went great
I sure enjoy this movie  I have wanted it for a while & when I could afford it i was gonna get it now i am glad it did......
Excellent.  Just as described with fast delivery
We watched this movie as a family and even my husband (the reluctant viewer) enjoyed it.
Love this B movie. Bought it for my bridesmaids.

This movie is hilarious. The acting is beyond amazing and the storyline keeps you guessing. GREAT CHICK FLICK!
This is a great movie.  I laughed the whole time and picturing friends doing the same thing for me.
Very funny!
Item was as described. Happy with purchase.
Enjoyed product!!!
I love this movie! It's so cute and funny :D if you love Raven Symone then you will love this movie.
Love this movie

Totally love this movie!! Raven Symone and Joanna Garcia are absolutely hilarious! It didn't get the recognition it deserved, but then again, it is a chick flick, i still enjoyed it. They really could not have picked a better cast. A very predictable movie, but most are...I seen this on some cable channel and just had to have it, money well spent.
I ordered 4 of these as a bridesmaids gift for my girls. They loved it!
Fun and enchanting. I would recommend it to all Hallmark or Disney lovers who may happen to be an adult.  It is fun to watch alone.
This was a heart warming and Hilarious movie. The entire family truly enjoyed watching this again and again. Thank you !
The movie was really funny I loved it! Specially because this is a DVD that you can watch with all the family. VERY FUNNY!
because it was very fun to watch for the whole family not the worst ABC Family's done though not the best
Great movie, and hilarious! I could watch his over and over. I love Ravens character. She is super sassy and brutally honest.
I'd been searching for this movie since I saw it on tv so I could finish watching it.  It's a delightful comedy with a happy ending.
This is the BEST Bridesmaid show ever made. Beats all other bridal shows. You will Laugh from beginning to end.
A standard light Romantic Comedy. If you like the stars you will like this movie. I thought it was predictable but fun to watch.

I honestly do not understand how this movie got such high ratings. I would have prefered to watch an episode of anything on TV over this. I did find out this was a TV movie, so that explains a lot. It was light hearted but I just did not enjoy it. The storyline was dull. The humor did not make me laugh. The actors were mediocre at best. I love Rom-coms but I did not like this one. Thought I should let others know that you may not love this like most of the reviewers did for some reason. If you are incredibly bored and have absolutely nothing to do, still, do ANYTHING but this. Ugh what a waste of time and mula.
I purchased this movie because I love movies and this is a really funny movie. I would recommend this movie to anyone who loves movies as much as I do.

This was a great and FUNNY movie.
Plot was great and the acting was very realistic and good.
Great movie to enjoy.

SM in colorado 3/15/13
I bought this as a gift for my daughters.  They said they didn't like it.  It's not anything like the first one.
This movie is wonderful.  I loved it so much I ordered more to give as Christmas gifts.  It is totally rewatchable.  My new favorite movie
I love this movie! Even being an ABC Family movie, this is great. its comical and light which I love.

This movie has just the right amount of funny and sweet.  I would not consider this a rom-com even though it it considered to be one.  Overall great movie to  watch with some girlfriends on a girls night or maybe right before a wedding to have some fun, just suggesting.
A good girls movie night flick! Lots of laughs! I finally had to get a copy for myself! Another great bargain.
A great movie that I couldn't find in stores. Such a shame. I love this movie and I was very impressed with the quality of this. It was just like new.
I laughed so much with this movie! I definitely recommend it. Absolutely terrific. Lots of fun. Shenanigans, to be sure!

I enjoyed the wit and maturity of this movie while it remained lighthearted.  Raven Symone was hilarious, and the other actresses were good as well.  The schemes they concocted were so fitting for the occasion.

While this is not a male bonding movie, it is pretty funny amd is a great family film. I think Tweens and perhaps older girls will find it amuzing and it certainly made me laugh. Bridzillas on the other hand should have to watch it, so they might see how silly they look!

I enjoy Raven Symone and Joanna Garcia, and they certainly helped make this one a treat.
I only watched it because Raven was in it, it was mean how they picked at her weight in the movie knowing she was sensitive about it in real life. All in all I give this movie a B minus.

.

This is a movie that my wife wanted to see.  First, she likes romantic comedies, and second we prefer movies that entertain us and get us to laugh.  Revenge of the Bridesmaids meets both of our goals.  There is romance and the film is funny so we were entertained.

In the story, four girls become friends as children and remain together throughout school and into their lives as young adults.  One on the four, Caitlin, has always enforced her will upon the others (Rachel, Abigail, and Parker), and lorded over the others because of her wealth and social position.  Eventually she steals Rachael's  boyfriend and decides to marry him.

Caitlin asks the other three to be her bridesmaids and they reluctantly agree.  Then Abigail decides that Caitlin is really after Rachael's boyfriend for his money and that they should expose Caitlin.  The fun begins.  The battle to expose Caitlin provides  a lot of funny scenes.

The DVD does not have any "extras", including closed caption for the hearing impaired.  The producers did not mention this lack of service so the buyer gets a second class product for first class prices.

Decades ago actors were trained how to enunciate so that the audience could  understand dialogue.  Recently many actors lack this skill, and, as a result, even with volume near maximum, it is tough to understand dialogue.  Close captions correct that problem.

This is a good movie.  It is funny with excellent acting.  The DVD does not do it justice.
I must rate Bridesmaids Revenge DVD as an average movie due to lack of technical support.

Got to love this movie. Sure, it's a little over the top, but so hillarious.  The actors are just right for their parts, and even though they over-act at times, it just seems to add to the crazy fun.  Watch the facial expressions and listen to the lines.  They will have you rolling with laughter.  This is a fun movie, and should be taken as such - just a lot of laughs.
What a hoot. My daughter's and my go to movie!
If you are open to a good laugh, this is a must see
Fun to watch
Unwatchable the dvd jumps and you can't watch it!
It's exactly what you'd expect - a fluffy movie with no substance, and pretty predictable plot. Very fun for a quiet "girls' night in," but not the movie of the year by any means!
This movie is one of my favorite and I was so happy when it got to me so fast. Thank you !
VERY CUTE MOVIE  ITS CUTE AND FUNNY  A MUST SEE <3
